name: MEC Calefaction Headband - Unisex
description:
If your ears catch the wind as you ride, or channel cold air directly toward your brain – try tucking this light little headband under your helmet.Made of 93% polyester  and 7% spandex.Shaped to cover ear tops to lobes.Keeps the front of your head warm too.

        Sustainability
